about:
We're a modern four piece acoustic/folk band from around the Berkshire area.

Our YouTube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/user/MartyrsAndKings

Follow us on Twitter -

@MartyrsAndKings

Mike - @MikeRGWilliams
Zach - @Zach_Johnsonn
James - @JamesHJackman
band_members:
- Mike Williams: Lead Vocals, Guitars
- Zach Johnson: Guitars
- Chris Bright: Bass Guitar, Guitars
- James Jackman: Drums, Percussion
influences:
Mike - The National, Jeff Buckley, R.E.M.

Zach - The Gaslight Anthem, Frank Turner, Deaf Havana

Chris - Red Hot Chili Peppers, Sigur Rós, Florence + the Machine

James - The National, Biffy Clyro, Dry The River
name: Martyrs & Kings
